actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the definition of "former President" under the Act of August 25, 1958 (Public Law 85-745), and for other purposes.

summary.text: Excludes former Presidents, whose service is terminated by resignation while impeachment proceedings are pending against them in either the House of Representatives or the Senate, from specified allowances and compensation provided by Federal law. (Amends 3 U.S.C. 102nt.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of "former President" under the Act of August 25, 1958 (Public Law 85-745), and for other purposes.
